to prepare the butter in a large mixing
bowl mix two cups of all-purpose flour
and one cup of rice flour also add in
salt sugar and turmeric powder about
half a teaspoon each the turmeric powder
will give the fritter or nice yellow
color later also add in one teaspoon of
baking powder or you can also replace
with two big 10x mix it up make a well
in the middle and pouring three cups of
water stir really well until you see no

a balloon whisk like this and whisk
vigorously until you have a smooth
batter
you can also strain the batter to remove
all the pockets of flour let it rest for
30 minutes for the shrooms we're gonna

15 minutes
